/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene scene of a winding road in Beijing, China. The road, a two-lane highway with a yellow dividing line, meanders through the heart of the city, disappearing into the distance. On either side of the road, lush green trees stand tall, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, adding to the tranquility of the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, giving a sense of depth and perspective to the viewer. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky. The perspective of the image, looking down the road towards the horizon, invites the viewer to imagine what lies beyond.
